info.brief_description: There are already a few unbirthing schools. Why not add another?
info.description:
Welcome to my version of an Unbirthing School. Surely this isn't the first or only unbirthing school interactive story, so you must already know what's it about.

Here are my rules, most you've seen in other unbirthing school stories:

1) Only soft vore, unbirth, anal vore and breast vore are allowed; any other kind of vore, like hard vore, hair vore or soul vore are not allowed.

2) Humans only.

3) No male pred, only females can vore, males will always be prey (females can be prey too).

4) No M/M action, only M/F and F/F

5) No herms/futas/dickgirls

6) No age regresion. This is one thing I find in unbirthing stories that I don't quite like, so I don't want it here.

7) Any kind of vore (that is allowed) can be willing or unwilling (wheter it is unwilling prey or pred).

8) I have no problem with underage prey, but NO pred allowed under the age of 16.

9) If the main character is digested or turned into breast milk, don't end the story there, just change to the point of view of the one who digested the main character, or the point of view of one of the main character's friends.

10) Don't make your additions to short. Make them at least three sentences long or more. And try to write them in first person.

11) Please, please, please!!! Don't write random stuff like "xfgfgjgfjgyhfghfghgjfgfjh". I HATE those kind of additions. And don't just write "she unbirthed him"; add some substance to your additions.

Alright, now this wouldn't be a school without some classes. So, assuming you would even write a chapter where the main character actually attended class, here are the unbirth and vore related classes in this school:

·Unbirthing Basics= the class for beginners who are just learning how to unbirth.

·Pregnant Unbirthing= the unbirthing class for pregnant girls, to teach them how to unbirth without placing their unborn child in danger.

·Advance Unbirthing= the class for experienced unbirthers, mostly teaches how to unbirth multiple prey or how to unbirth someone who's already unbirthed someone else or is pregnant.

·Unbirthing Savior= mostly for those wishing to save their friends, this class teaches you how to stop someone from digesting their prey by unbirthing them.

·Vore Basics= for beginners who are just learning how to vore, it's a class for the basics of soft vore.

·Advance Vore= A class for experienced vorers, a class for soft vore, breast vore, and anal vore.

·Live Vore= a class that teaches you how to keep your prey alive inside your stomach without digesting them, and how to keep your prey alive inside your breast without turning them into breast milk or breast fat (or breast mass). It's also teaches how to avoid being digested if you're eaten.

Now remember, the main character doesn't HAVE to go to his/her classes, this was just to make this place look more like a school and not just one big unbirthing playground.

Now go on and have fun.
